files.name: README.txt
files.content: I study at the University of Technology in Brno, specifically at the Faculty of Information Technology. At the time of writing I am 19 and I have been self-learning programming for ~6 years. I mostly enjoy programming in languages like C#, C, C++... One of my most useless skills is that I can do something in the J programming language. I enjoy functional programming (and Haskell) but I use it only when it makes sense.
